thread.title: Papa Francis arakebura abategetsi ba R D Congo - BBC Gahuza
thread.title_full: Papa Francis arakebura abategetsi ba R D Congo - BBC Gahuza

title: Papa Francis arakebura abategetsi ba R D Congo - BBC Gahuza
text:
Papa Francis arakebura abategetsi ba R D Congo 19 Ukwa kabiri 2017 Uwufise ububasha kwâ€™isanamu AP Image caption Papa Francis yakebuye abakoresha abana mu ntambara muri Congo Mu gisabisho c'uyu munsi, umwungere wa Ekleziya katolika Papa Francis yakebuye abakoresha abana mu ntambara muri Republika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. 
Ubugizi bwa nabi bukomeza kwiyongera muri Congo kuva mu mezi aheze. 
Ku munsi wa gatanu, habonetse video isa n'iyerekana abasirikare ba Congo barasa ku bantu badafise ibigwanisho mu ntara ya Kasai. 
Perezida Joseph Kabila yategerezwa kuba yavuye ku butegetsi arangije ikiringo ciwe mu kwezi kwa 12 umwaka uheze, ariko ntavyo yakoze. 
Umwumvikano hagati y'abanyapolitike bari bahujwe n'abaserukira Ekleziya Katolika, umwemerera kuguma ku butegetsi gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka.
